column5: Was there someone looking for a trailer not too long ago? I can't remember if it was someone looking for a trailer or someone that had a trailer and was looking for a boat (I did a search but it didn't turn up anything). At any rate, I passed one on Hwy 6 between Mount Hope and Caledonia. PM me if you need more info. Jim
what size? and was there a price that you could see? I know someone who wants one for a 14' tincan...
I'll stop and ask (and maybe take a pic or two) Jim

Just drove by it... it is a rather large Roller trailer.. older condition and what appears to have auto tires on it.. he has a bunch of other stuff on his front lawn as well... the property is located south of Unity Rd on the East hand side of Hwy #6  G
I'll add to this, if anyone is looking for a small box trailer PM me and I'll get the information a neighbour of mine also has it in his drive way for sale, north Woodbridge.
